mainText:
Mr. Jobs:

Having grown up with Apple products, I remember being so excited to use 
a Macintosh computer for the first time. The vision was so special and 
everyone knew it - even then.   You truly brought, and continue to bring 
as your legacy, such joy to everyone, including industries of artists! 
Your reach is far, limitless and unquantifiable.  You actually changed 
entire industries - not just the computer industry itself.   You are a 
testament to possibilities.  Thank you for living your gifts!!
author: Imani
